channel.title: Knight on My Comic
channel.description: Recent content in Knight on My Comic

item.title: Secret Treasure
item.description: Confession time: I worked for Cutco for a summer in college, and it was absolutely soul-crushing. I still have the knives, though. They’re actually pretty nice, which is how they get you.
item.content:encoded: Confession time: I worked for Cutco for a summer in college, and it was absolutely soul-crushing. I still have the knives, though. They’re actually pretty nice, which is how they get you.
